Articles.Content:
This is a short video I created, which explains how to get to the Mun and back!

I tried to be straight forward and easy to understand!

PLEASE NOTE: This is only the way I recommend doing this, you are not obligated to do this and there are a million more efficient ways of doing this, but this is a good guide on the overall concept of reaching the Mun. I find that these techniques work for me and any constructive criticism is very welcome. Please like if you liked it, comment and if you're feeling nice subscribe.

Here you go!

Enjoy, and thank you very much for reading!

Edited April 12, 2014 by EliteShadowLeo

Just so you know, you can embed the video so it plays in the thread here. Edit your post (the OP) and click on the little film strip above the text box and paste your youtube link into that. Then your video will play here and more people are likely to watch it.

It will look like this

Or you could type [] with `video` in there then your youtube link followed by another pair of [] with `/video` in them (can`t put the `video` in the [] or it will be read as HTML) if you like to type them.
